title: ishanE indha
sahitya:
eesanE inda Ezhakkiranga innum taamasamaa

samaana rahitanaana

(eesanE)



anupallavi



shree cidambara vaasanE jagadeesanE

kanaka sabEsanE naDaraajanE

(eesanE)



caraNam 1



ee eRumbODu manidaneeRaa

yeDutta piRaivikkaLavumilaiyE

Oyvillaamal ooNuRakkattiRku

uzhaikkum kavalai ozhiyavilaiyE

maayamaNNilum peNNilum ponnilum

vaLarum aasai ozhiyavillaiyE

(eesanE)



caraNam 2



kaayumaRalidoodar vandaal mana

kalakkam aTrirukka vazhiyumilaiyE

kaamanai eritta vizhiyOy!

kaalanai udaitta kazhalOy!

somanai aNinda muDiyOy!

sundaranaDamiDum kunjidapada

(eesanE)
